content.detailedDescription: Sitting in hot tub looking at south sky. december 2003..  sky clear, noclouds,many stars to see in spite of city light.  between  i think mars andanother bright starplanet to the right, a bright  star-like light  blinked onfor about 3 seconds.  then went off.  2-3 minutes later no clouds bright lightas bright as jupiter, mars. venus went on again...And for the next 30minutes.... on and off, wife and i saw it again and again... same relativeposition., friend told me fixed satellite, but i looked next night, saw nothing. nothing.  and then several nights since.   this was not a plane as i know theairport to be south of  town also and the approach to tallahasse airport issouth and north of town.  this was no airplane. this was not a satellite.Don

Mr erdmann, his father and three family friends were camping at their accustomedhunting camp in the breaks of central montana. their first day there they founda mutilated cow classic in its bloodless, clean cuts and removal of sexualorgans. reporting  this to the owner they were met with hostility. the next dayreturning in the dark to their camp they saw bright lights in the field and then investigating observed a saucer type craft covered with netting andilluminated with generator lights.The five of them had hunting binoculars andwere able to  closely observe "men" removing crates from the craft via a landingramp. the men were dressed in black with black baseball caps.They observed the craft for five minutes and then felt sudden concern for theirsafety and left hurredly. returning to camp they were adverse to discussion ofthe event and all slept until 09:30 although it was their inevitable custom toarise at 05:00.
content.summary: Close observation of landed craft possible conecte

content.detailedDescription: This is just one of many extraterrestrial contacts ive had over the years. since ive had so many contacts, including abductions, i thought i would write abook.  what you will read is chapter 3.Intruder alert - 1309yyxyz bug09serious events often happen in this world that cause me to worry.  when thingsof a national or global nature occur, many people92s lives are affected.  there isn92t a lot i can do, but i don92t feel totally helpless.  as a citizen, i believe it92s my civic duty to write letters to public officials.  i write to express myviews when i think there92s a chance i can help people in positions of power understand reality a littlebetter.09when i write, i often use symbolism and analogies.  since everything in theuniverse is relative, it92s sometimes easier to step back and look at the situation from a different,relative angle.  once i grasp the basic principle, i92m in a better position to apply my knowledge to the situation.  some can getthe wrong idea about what i92m trying to do when i write letters.09in september, 1998, i felt the need to write a letter to the president of theunited states.  our president was in the process of being impeached from officeand impeachments don92t happen every day.  i thought he might be able to use a little moral supportfrom a fellow citizen.09i thought i was writing him a private letter, but i learned there is no suchthing as a nine-page, private letter written to the president.  the number-10envelope was about an inch thick.  i92m certain the envelope raised eyebrows when it reached the white house - andpossibly, before it got there.09i had serious doubts as to whether i should mail it.  i wanted to be certain iwas doing the right thing by expressing my thoughts.  the letter sat on my deskfor a few days before i finally decided to mail it.09on the way to the post office, a man in an old car with an american flag onthe front bumper pulled up behind me.  i heard one of those little voices insidemy head.  i thought the voice was telepathic and coming from the man in the car. the voice said,93that92s a good letter, avery.9409i wondered, how does he know it92s a good letter  there92s no way he could have read it.09after i mailed the letter, i didn92t think much about it until the following day.  i was on my way home from myreal estate office.  a guy in a truck pulled up beside me at one of manystoplights.  he was in the next lane to m
content.summary: I was attacted and questioned by a gray extraterre

content.detailedDescription: My wife was droping me offwork. the smoke trail make us notice it. it was soclose i had no problems to figure out it was a ufo. we stay inside my   minivanjust staring at it, we was in shock. the object was a big long cilindrical shapeship it was leaving a smoke trail and then flames start coming out,after that itwhen start gaining speed  so fast it disapeart.

I was on my way home in dudley, i was on a small hill looking out towards clenthills. 30 degrees left of the hills i saw a bright yellow coloured orb with aslightly red orange center just over a mile or two away. it faded slightly twiceand dissapeared whilst holding its position in the sky.

Walking into day progam, and was looking up at daytime moon and checking forchemtrails is what made me notice object.  i was totally enthralled as iwas finally observing a ufo and afterward i am still thinking about it someeven though it was by no means a close encounter.  the object appeared ascylindrical from side view that i thought i was observing.  very intenselywhite in color and about 1cm in lenght and perhaps 1-2mm in width.Object traveled in straight line in and out of clouds till i lost sight of itbehind a clould to the north.
content.summary: Very white object over toms river, nj

content.detailedDescription: I am a night shift rn and went outside to see where mars was in august.  inoticed two bright stars, but they also had pulsating lights of blue, green,red.  i called out several of my psych techs and they also observed the lightsand found a couple more, too.  one even saw them also pulsating in yellow.  wethought they might be some satellites or aerial observation to do with marsbeing so close to earth.  something colleges or weather bureaus had put up,maybe to take pictures of mars. this is december and they are still there.  iwatch them every night.  i didnt really think of reporting it until i read onthe coast to coast talk show web site about others seeing these lights in londonand our east coast.  they just hang there in the same spots in the sky andpulsate these four colors.  many techs have also seen them over the past months. they dont seem to move or make noise....Just hang there.  we sure would like toknow what they are.  out here in the middle of the desert it sure cant be causedby humidity or ice crystals we can also hear that persistent humming tone duringthe night when everything is quiet that people are talking about.  it soundslike a semi-truck engine idling in the distance.

At approx. 605 pm cent. time , i went out to the back porch deck to have acigarette . while standing there , i noticed a large , bright , triagular shapedobject in the night sky , directly over mid town omaha , ne. i live near theairport , and at first thought it was a big jet readying to land . as i stoodoutside smoking my cigarette , i noticed the object was not getting any closerto my house . if it were a commercial airplane , it would have usually passedover my house to get to the airport , going from sw to ne . this object stayedin the same spot for another 10 min. and i brought it to my nephew  brother - in- laws attention as they left for a christmas program . my nephew said it seemedto pulse . i went inside to call a friend who lives about 7 miles south of menear downtown omaha , and he said could see something very bright in thatdirection , but was somewhat obscured from his vantage point .I proceeded to call the local news stations to inquire if anyone else had seenit or if they knew what it was . they were all interested , but did nt know ofanything . i went back out after warming up and getting off the phone , and theobject was gone . when initially seeing the anomaly , i noticed a few stars inthe sky , and noticed they were in the same spots i had viewed them , ruling outcloud cover blocking ouy the object.

A month ago i reported to you about seeing a lighted object in sky near new orleans. then after seeing the ufo. we were driving through dark area on i-10 east just past state line when we noticed two crafts hovering above the jeep. i believe it may have left residue or something on my front winshield. i noticed it when it was cold and wet the fog on the windshield revealed that there was a shape or drawing on the glass. i asked my friend if he had put something on it and he said no, i noticed that the picture on the windshield could have been an exact drawing of what i saw on nov 14. my friend then pointed out there was a duplicate of the same thing on the passenger side of the winshield. we pulled over to examine it more closely and both agree that it was the same as what we saw. my friend seems to believe there is symbols or writing around the circles but it just looks like swiggles to me. however all of it is really symmetrical and it definitely was not drawn by hand it is too perfect. we rubbed to try and get it off the window but it won't come off.

Witness was passenger in vehicle traveling west on i-40 near the cornwell exitdirectly before the garth brooks blvd exit. witness glanced out the windown andsaw cigar shaped object that was silver/gray somewhat dulled color in sky. atfirst thought it was a plane. upon continued watching object, it did not move.Witness was in heavy traffic and traffic was moving slowly. object appeared tonot move for apx time frame of 10 minutes. witness lost sight of object whentraffic picked up and road curve where witness could not see the same location.Witness never saw object move or disappear.
I cant even describe it.. it was scary... it was just all of a sudden, there

I was sitting in my sunroom in midtown atlanta georgia and i noticed a brightgreen light travelling at a very high rate of speed.  i am a trained privatepilot and have never seen an aircraft travel descend at this rate of speed, norseen any aircraft in the atlanta traffic pattern travel at the velocity of thelight.  i noticed the object in my peripheral vision while watching television. i thought the object was a crashing aircraft or some type of missile.  i turnedto my wife and she saw the object as well.  a bright green object decending orcrashing, off the horizon in the area of piedmont park, atlanta, ga.
content.summary: Saw fast moving bright green light

content.detailedDescription: myself and two friends, david trump and bill rice, were standing, grilling outdoors when i looked up and i saw what appeared to be a moving star that made some unusual flight patterns before disappearing. it had the same color and intensity of a star. we saw it descend from the edge of the atmosphere looking towards the northeast. it moved downward for almost a minute before it turned at about 90 degrees and headed back out of the sky accelerating as it left. it looked like a ball of white light but it seemed to move in a coordinated manner. we stood there and watched in amazement not sure of what it was that we were seeing. i am still unsure. i think that if a being or person were inside it, as it was a solid object, they would have been killed by the rapid change of direction it made. it seemed to defy gravity and not to have the limitations of flight that known manmade objects possess.

Heard dog barking, we went outside and noticed an aircraft to the north eastnear mountains.It was a triangle with 3 circleish lights near each angle. it wascompletely silent, thats what was really wierd and it stood motionless in theair without any wobbling etc. maybe it was some test aircraft since theres asecret base to the north of me.

My mother was on the phone and looked out the window to check the weather,and iwas in the bedroom playing a video game when she asked me to look at whatappeared to be a headlight in the sky .So i got my camcorder so i could zoom inand see what it was .And by eye it looked to be solid white but through thecamera it had red color on it too. and it would hover then it would fly in adownward direction and appeared to disentegrate into a bunch of small greylooking particles then it would come back together again it did it twice on tapeand my mother turned the backyard light on to check on the animals and itdisappeared . my mother was scared and nervous because shes seen other lightsout here and it disturbs her not knowing if shes safe or not and i was scaredbut curious because im not sure what it was but i have a very short and videoand it was taken looking out my bedroom window so its not real clear but you cansee it and how it came apart and back together again and i thought id report itso thank you for your time and hope we can be of help thanks .
content.summary: I saw a white and red light in the sky outside my

content.detailedDescription: First i would like to say that this was not my experience, but one that i ampassing on from my grandparents. both are embarrassed by this experience and donot wish to talk about it... although i feel it is important for someone else toknow. my grandparents told me about their personal encounter at our familycottage in the fall of 2001. my grandmother had set the alarm for 4am to get upto view a meteor shower, but she awoke early and went to get a glass of water inthe kitchen. she looked out the front window to the north and noticed what shethought was the aurora borealis. so, she returned to the bedroom to get herglasses and came back, stunned by how beautiful they were she once againreturned to the bedroom, only this time to wake my grandfather. they decided toget a better view and go outside. they were viewing the north from our deckoutside with the cottage behind them to the south they told me for what theythought was close to 10 minutes. finally my grandmother turned around only tosee as she described it a disc, hovering less than 5 feet above the trees. mygrandfather described it to me as more umbrella shaped. it was very large and tothe southeast just over the rear of the camp and the very tall about 50 feetspruce trees behind the camp. they described colourful streams of light floatingdown from the object as how a neon light blub has bubbles through it when itsstarting to burn out. my grandmother and grandfather both saw the colourfulbubbles floating off the craft. they told me they felt calm, and not threatenedin any way. they told me they stood there, quiet, watching the object not morethan 400feet away for nearly 20 minutes. and as my grandmother described it, themosquitos came out of nowhere and persuaded them to return to bed. i was shockedto hear this because the object remained above the camp as they went backinside. they told me again they felt safe and went back to sleep. i would reallylike to discuss this with someone who is somewhat qualified in the area of ufosightings. thank you for your time.

My wife was dropping me off for work,we were on the companys lot.Then we saw along smoke trail.I knew it was a spaceship,it was too big to miss.Our reactionswere of disbelief.The object was hovering treetop leaving a smoke trail, thenflames started coming out, then the object start gaining speed,moving at anincredible speed ,then it disappear in the sky.

I was 7 years old and in the back seat of the car on my way to my grandmothers.My parents were in the front seat and my sister in brother were in back with me,but to young  i believe to notice or anythingthey were 4 and 2. we came to astop at the end of the trailer park getting ready to enter the main roadway andi just happened to look up at the shy through the rear window of the car and sawthe object.  it was a clear night sky and the object blocked out directly abovestars. it was black and perfectly triangular.  it was maybe 20-30 feet above ourvehicle.  immediately i became excited and started telling my parents to look atthe aliens ship.  they however didnt and were involved in telling me it was aplane from the nearby air national guard.  i remember trying to tell them itwasnt but being unable to explain.  however something told me t was not a plane. it was very slowly moving, just faster than a hovering craft, and it wassilent.  i heard nothing or saw no lights or anything else, just the triangularobject that was jet black against the sky and clearly oultined as a triangle andblocking out my vision of otherwise clearly visible stars.  my father thenpulled onto the main road and i lost sight as we drove away and just felt verycalm about what i had seen.  i just always thought this was wild and alwaysthought about the object, because until the past few years i had never heard oftriangular shaped ufos, only saucer shaped.

1 we just go off the tarmac and we were talking2 i happened to glance up3 no idea there were 5 of us and everybody agreed we had never seen anythinglike it before4 awe,excitement,curious5 we all became quite and fixed on this object..It just stayed in one spot aperfect green triangle....Silent and we had no frame of reference it appearedsolid ,,,it was a clear night,,,no clouds the stars were out in abundance but wecould not see behind this object the stars were hidden behind the craft6it faded away slowly before our eyes ....It was like it just slowly lost itsshape and illumination and broke up something like reminded me of soap bubblesjust popping and disappearing

To whom it may concern,there is more to this than your sterile questionnaire asked. i was just a childwhen i had seen those 3 bright red lights. to start off with i had a telescope,cheap little tasco but it was good enough to view the moon. i had set it upknowing the cold air would allow me to get a clearer view of the moon. whilelooking into the scope i noticed it went dark and then the moon re-appeared.Thinking a leaf or something was blocking my view i pulled away to have a look.I saw it then. please understand i was an air force brat, usaf planes were mylife, and i used to be able to tell you every known aircraft we had. what i sawwas not a usaf plane by no means. i saw this thing pass in front of the fullmoon, it was black and shaped like a triangle, and on all three corners it hadbright red lights. they moved to and fro from the dark object. i called for myfather. he and my sister came out to see what the fuss was about. i pointedupward, matter of fact almost directly above our house. we stood there lookingat this thing, the lights danced around ityou could make out the back triangle shape. my father yelled at us to getinside, now he was very upset at what he was looking at. he called someone onthe phoneat the time i assumed it to be the military police. my sister and i glued ourfaces to the sliding glass door watching the object. we could here siren fromthe sp92s coming, about that time the object shot up and vanished. people came to ourhouse asking questions about what we had seen. i was very adamant about what wehad all seen, i was told i had only seen a plane doing test. i was sent to myroom, being a noisy i listened to the adults speak. i heard them talking aboutothers seeing the object, and to assure us the kids it was only a plane and theywould handle it from there on. my father agreed with them. i know something waswrong with what my father had seen with us, appeared to have recognized what hehad seenthere is a lot more about this thing we had seen - i found out later in life.My father told me things i have dared not tell anyone about.What my fatherhas been a witness too and involved in is dangerousyou judge what i have said here, i trust nobody in this matter

Summary of witness statement from hbccufo website, brian vike, director:object was oval in shape.  coming from the east and horizontal.  as it gets veryclose it turns to a vertical position and emits a red glow.  remains sidewaysfor a few seconds, then simply blinks off.  just disappeared.  the moon wasrising to the southeast of vantage point, air was surreal and it was quiet.  witness statements from nov. 13 & 15 e-mails:i can offer you no further information regarding november 8, 2003, except whatbrian vike posted.The light came in in a horizontal position. it was turning to its side orvertical as i was proceeding to take the picture. it emitted a reddish glow orreflection around it but was clearly brilliant white itself. it stoppedand before i snapped again it just vanished.I may only add that when it was coming in horizontal from the east it wasmore of a blue color....I later watched the eclipse and have had no furtherincidents.It is our estimation that the object or light was 30 long in the verticalposition.
content.summary: Bright oval object approached, turned on side, van

content.detailedDescription: We were on a pond in brussels, fishing out of our boat when my wife priscillanoticed something we thought to be a jet plane in the sky.  then we just kept onfishing, but as it got closer we noticed that it didnt look quite right.  itsstanged disc shape was unkown to us and it just kept coming closer and closer. it descended, brushed into a patch of trees by the pond, the hit the water. because of its windows we could see something inside, but it was unclear as towhat it was.  apparently, it was very hot because when it touched the watersteam began to rise up fogging up the windows and making it difficult to seeinside.  our dog was in the boat with us and barked uncontrollably during thewhole event.  when i tried to calm him, he bit my hand, which he has never donebefore.  the waves immitted from the impact capsized our boat and sent usoverboard.  at that point there was much confusion, and i was dissy.  my wifeadmitted to being dizzy as well.  after a minute or two, the craft had liftedout of the water and flown back into the air.  my dog drowned, and dead fishcame to the surface.  birds near by in the tress were flying over head in largenumbers.  i was very afraid during the whole event, and felt somewhat out of mybody.  it was extremely surreal, and as it left i began to fell sick, a feelingmy wife later said she felt as well.  being in the water with so much chaos ijust lost sight of the craft, and i dont know how, but when i looked up onlyafter a few seconds, which felt like hours, it was gone.  however, the strangestand most unexplainable event occured after my wife and i had swam ashore.  lyingon the edge of the pond i found a burnt limb of some sort, but w
Emissionaurasoundhumabout 60 witnesses saw two large white-green objects in the skysurroundingsnormal_sound_absentspeciesdogreaction_typefearpsych_during_eventinvoluntary_actions
content.summary: Saw two large white and green lights hovering over

content.detailedDescription: I was having my coffee break at work when i observed the first object. i saw itmoving in a circular pattern.I thought it was a white pigeon.When it acendedinto a cloud and came back out again i went out to get a better look and saw the2nd object. it was identical to the first moving in same circular pattern as ufo1.They both moved to the ne.And still moving in circular pattern.They wentbehind a cloud bank this is when i lost sight of them.This was a daylightobservation.I was quite surprised by this event.All i require from this reportis a logical explanation of what i may have wittnessed.
content.summary: I saw 2 ufos moving in a clockwise pattern

content.detailedDescription: I was looking directly south over the gulf of mexico when i began to look to myright westand became aware of a very bright object above the horizon.The objectwas much more radiant than any stars and larger as well. at this point anotherobject with various strobes on it was closing in on this object which was above.I took this second object to be a military heliocopter due to its slow speed. asthe copter flew directly under it the bright object simply vanished as ifturning off a light.The second object come to a stop and began a back and forthflying pattern as if looking for something. the bright object did not reappearhowever the other craft, helicopter , what have you , remained in the same areafor approximently three to four minutes longer and continued towards land.

Getting ready for bed. my wife was sleeping, but was woken up by the houseshaking. no sightings, but a massive sound that covered several miles and lasted10 minutes. similar to a huge engine, like a locomotive starting up, but muchlarger. on the scale of an earthquake or tornado that sounds like a train cominginto you house. came from west of beachwood,ohio. some activity 2-3 miles awayprobably shaker heights with a helicopter circling for over 20 minutes.Policedepartments had other complaints, but no answers.

I have finally decided to report an incident that has happened when i was 8 or 9years old.My friends and i5 of us in totalwere out bike riding through ourneighborhood and school yard when david noticed something above us.We allstopped and looked up,then seen this round orange ball about 12 a mile to a milehigh in the sky.Now,at the time,i never knew what a ufo was,we all just lookedat it and wondered what it was.We all decided to go to the nearest house welived atwhich was davidsand tell the parents.It was about a 1 minute bike rideto his house and when we got there,he ran inside to get his mom and dad.Itseemed the object followed us from the school yard right to davids house.Davidcame out of the house with his parents looking up to the sky.They couldn,tbelieve what they were seeing,we all stared up at it for a few minutes whendavids mom asked davids older brother to get the camera.He ran in the house ,gotthe camera,came back out and started taking pictures.As soon as the first clickof the camera sounded,the object started to move west of us at a high speed,sofast we got 3 pictures of it.Their next door neighbors was outside watching allthis with us and nobody could explain what has just happened.Davids mom phoned afew radio stations and they refered her to the local planetarium.To this day,i,ve never seen the pictures we took ,but then again ,i didnt need to afterwitnessing it with my own eyes.I look up in the sky everyday to hopefully seesomething like it again.I wish i could remember all of my friends names at thetime,but only davids sticks out because he was a good friend then.
content.summary: My friends and i spot an orange ball above us

content.summary: Saw very odd object morphing across the sky

content.detailedDescription: A joint investigation conducted by mufon of georgia and the national uforeporting center. this report narrative was written by olivia newton, with commentary notesinserted by tom sheets.
content.summary: Intrusion of small swarming red discs into moving

content.detailedDescription: It was around 10 pm in pensacola. we were going through a green light at anintersection from pine forest road and bearing left onto mobile highway.Shortly after getting through the intersection which only had a couple carswaiting for the light to change sitting perpendicular to us we saw a small lightbehind trees that were a few hundred feet behind the lights rise up straightwith no wobble. i immediately thought it was a helicopter and was not notworried but within seconds literally it rose up above the trees maybe as littleas 50 feet and an intense whitish-blue light that was large in diameter shoneinto our mirrors. we never actually looked back but were very aware this wasnt acar as it isnt near a highway or close to an airport and there werent any carsbehind us going through the intersection. it was obvious to me that i hadnt seenanything like it before. the light was only visible for 5 seconds id say. thenit disappeared and at that point my brother and i both acknowledged seeing itand wondering what the hell it was. this is all in a short amount of time and weare still quite close to the intersection. i have no idea if my brother was evenwatching the road or if the radio was on or if the headlights dimmed. but, theoddest part about this is that almost immediately after we confirmed seeing thelight to eachother, i saw the traffic lights blinking red to green to yellow, onand on. not necessarily in that order but it was only for about 10 seconds andit went back to normal like nothing had happened. we opened the windows andheard nothing. i did notice a car at the light that did not move during thisperiod. we didnt want to just forget about it so we turned around and went backthe way we came watching for anything mysterious. we saw and heard nothing. weare not sci-fi buffs and are not going to be fooled into thinking it was a veryquiet helicopter, if it were we would have heard something. i dont know if thismatters but i mentioned it to a friend online and he said that he has seenlights many times at night and he has been in fl his whole life. he saidpensacola and gulf breeze are known for ufo sightings. please let me knowwhatever you can related to the information i gave you, and sorry i dont knowdirectional stuff well so i didnt fill in those sections. thanks.
content.summary: Large bright blueish-white light rising at interse
